index.screenText:
Select the appropriate options.
Q8. Which of these statements is true for the following graph?

options.option: <font face="calibribold" size='3.1'>The slopes of the line are greater than zero.</font>
<font face="calibribold" size='3.1'>The intercept of these lines are all the same.</font>
<font face="calibribold" size='3.1'>This graph represents a series of parallel lines.</font>
<font face="calibribold" size='3.1'>The slopes of these lines range from -1 to +1.</font>
<font face="calibribold" size='3.1'>Both A and B are true.</font>

index.FeedbackIncorrect:
Not Quite!

The Correct Answer is: Option E

Read the explanation below to clear your understanding.
Statement A is true because for all of the lines the value of y increases with every unit increase in the value of x.
Statement B is also true because the y-intercept is true for all of the lines, i.e., they all pass through y = 0.
Therefore option E, i.e., "Both A and B are true" is the correct one.
